DOC.brief_summary: To compare the effect of Crinone 8% administered once daily versus other vaginal progesterone in terms of ongoing pregnancy rate 5 weeks after embryo transfer as well as patient convenience.
DOC.brief_title: A Prospective Randomized Multicentre Study to Compare Crinone 8% Once Daily Versus Other Vaginal Progesterone.
DOC.criteria: 1840 years Regular menstrual cyclus 2535 days both ovaries present No more than 2 previous IVF attempts Have given written informed consent More than 2 previous attempts Known drug abuse Known allergies to the study medication No embryo transfer performed in the study cycle Previous participating in the study
